Ghada Abdel Razek, Maged El Masry, Fathy Abd Alwahab, Carolin Khalil, Ahmed Abd El Wareth, Mohamed Gom`aa, Mahmoud Desouqy

programme.title: Taj (Ep15)
programme.desc: Action, Romance, Drama, History, Thriller 2024 In the midst of Syria's French mandate, boxer Taj fights not just in the ring, but against accusations of treason from within the resistance, leading him on a gripping journey to prove his loyalty and innocence. Taym Hassan, Bassam Kousa, Dogana Isa, Farah Al Dabiyat, Noura Rahhal, Samer Al Barqawi, Omar Abu Saada, Taim Hasan, Bassam Kouss, Dogana Essa, Farah Al Dbayyat, Nora Rahal, Faia Younan, Nora Rahhal

programme.title: Exit 7 (Ep1)
programme.desc: Comedy, People, Drama 2020 Various sketches depicting the social issues that face the Saudi people approached from a humorous perspective. programme.title: Katha Ankahee (Ep85)
programme.desc: Drama, Family, Thriller, Bollywood 2022 While seeking money for her child's healthcare needs, Katha is in trouble after Viaan's offer to help her. Aditi Sharma, Adnan Khan, Azinkya Mishra, Samar Vermani, Jasveenn Kaur, Ravi Bhushan

programme.title: Ayyoub (Ep9)
programme.desc: People, Drama 2018 In a bid to improve his life, a modest young man strives to handle multiple jobs, but his friends and relatives throw him in prison. He loses his mother after that, which leads him to take revenge. Mostafa Shabaan, Ayten Amer, Mohamed Lotfy, Hannah El Zahed, Mirhan Hussein, Ahmad Saleh, Mohamed Sayyed Basheer

programme.title: The Queen (Ep30)
programme.desc: Drama 2023 Fame, fortune, and love, Ates, one of the country's most iconic basketball players, and his wife Deniz had it all, until a devastating scandal shattered their perfect world. Cevdet Mercan, Serhan Sahin, Ava DuVernay, Burcu Özberk, Gokhan Alkan, Selin Sekerci

programme.title: The Agent Of Love (Ep20)

programme.title: PL: United v Liverpool 11/12
programme.desc: United Archives 11/2/12. The Reds were out for revenge against Liverpool having been beaten in the FA Cup at Anfield two weeks earlier, adding some extra spice to this always fiery affair.

programme.title: LC: Leeds v United 11/12
programme.desc: United Archives 20/9/11. The white-hot atmosphere of Elland Road awaited a young United side, with Leeds hoping for a repeat of their shock FA Cup win in 2010.

programme.title: PL: Everton v United 11/12
programme.desc: United Archives 29/10/11. After a derby disaster last time out, the Reds faced a tough trip to Goodison Park desperate to get back to winning ways.

programme.title: PL: Aston Villa v United 11/12
programme.desc: United Archives 3/12/11. Sir Alex's side took on Aston Villa looking to keep up their incredible run at Villa Park, where the Reds were unbeaten in the Premier League since 1995.

programme.title: PL: Fulham v United 11/12
programme.desc: United Archives 21/12/11. After victory over QPR, the Reds faced a midweek return to the capital looking to claim three points from Craven Cottage.

programme.title: PL: United v Newcastle 12/13
programme.desc: United Archives 26/12/12. The Reds welcomed Newcastle for a Boxing Day clash that could allow them to stretch their advantage at the top of the table.

programme.title: PL: United v Swansea 12/13
programme.desc: United Archives 12/5/13 . United took on Swansea looking to bring down the curtain in style as Sir Alex took charge of his final home game as United boss.

programme.title: FAC: United v Chelsea 12/13
programme.desc: United Archives 10/3/13. The Reds faced holders Chelsea in a heavyweight FA Cup clash.

programme.title: PL: United v Newcastle 12/13
programme.desc: United Archives 26/12/12. Unfortunate Newcastle are pipped at the final hurdle in this gripping Boxing Day match at Old Trafford.

programme.title: PL: Southampton v United 12/13
programme.desc: United Archives 2/9/12. Sir Alex's 1000th league game in charge of United saw them face a trip to the south coast to take on newly-promoted Southampton.

programme.title: PL: Man City v United 12/13
programme.desc: United Archives 9/12/12. Relive this unforgettable Manchester derby as United travelled to the Etihad Stadium knowing victory would leave Sir Alex Ferguson's side in pole position in the title race.

programme.title: CL: Real Madrid v United 12/13
programme.desc: United Archives 13/2/13. United faced a huge Champions League clash with Real Madrid, pitting Sir Alex's side against their former talisman Cristiano Ronaldo.

programme.title: PL: United v Aston Villa 12/13
programme.desc: United Archives 22/4/13. Defeat for Manchester City against Tottenham meant that a win would secure the Reds a historic 20th league title, could they see off Aston Villa?

programme.title: PL: Aston Villa v United 12/13
programme.desc: United Archives 10/11/12. Villa Park has been a happy hunting ground for the Reds down the years, how would a new-look Aston Villa side under Paul Lambert fare against Sir Alex's men?

programme.title: PL: Chelsea v United 12/13
programme.desc: United Archives 28/10/12. The Reds traveled to Stamford Bridge looking to derail the Blues flying start to the season and close the gap at the top of the Barclays Premier League.

programme.title: FAC: United v Chelsea 12/13
programme.desc: United Archives 10/3/13. The Reds faced holders Chelsea in a heavyweight FA Cup clash.

programme.title: PL: Man City v United 12/13
programme.desc: United Archives 9/12/12. Relive this unforgettable Manchester derby as United travelled to the Etihad Stadium knowing victory would leave Sir Alex Ferguson's side in pole position in the title race.

programme.title: PL: Man City v United 12/13
programme.desc: United Archives 9/12/12. Relive this unforgettable Manchester derby as United travelled to the Etihad Stadium knowing victory would leave Sir Alex Ferguson's side in pole position in the title race.

programme.title: CL: Real Madrid v United 12/13
programme.desc: United Archives 13/2/13. United faced a huge Champions League clash with Real Madrid, pitting Sir Alex's side against their former talisman Cristiano Ronaldo.

programme.title: El Beatle
programme.desc: Special documentary celebrating 50 years since George Best's sensational European performance where he became 'El Beatle'.

programme.title: FAC: v Oldham 93/94 SF Replay
programme.desc: United Archives 8/4/90. United take on Joe Royle's Oldham at Maine Road after a last minute Mark Hughes goal secured a replay three days prior at Wembley.

programme.title: All The Goals: Cavani
programme.desc: Enjoy every stunning strike from Edinson Cavani's unforgettable spell at Old Trafford.

programme.title: PL: Manchester City v United 93/94

programme.title: Cacamwnci

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Mae Sam wedi mynd am drip pysgota ac wedi mynd â bocs o lysiau Siôn gydag e mewn camgymeriad! Sut fydd y criw yn datrys hyn tybed? Sam mixes up a box of ice with a box of vegetables!

programme.title: Asra

programme.title: Digbi Draig

programme.title: Bendibwmbwls

programme.title: Guto Gwningen
programme.desc: Mewn cystadleuaeth mae Guto'n profi ei fod yn haeddu bod yn rhan o griw'r wiwerod. Guto proves he's got what it takes to be part of the squirrel tribe.

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd
programme.desc: Timau o Ysgol Ynys Wen sy'n ymuno â Pwdryn a Melys i chwarae llond trol o gemau lliwgar! Teams from Ysgol Ynys Wen join Pwdryn and Melys to play a series of candyland themed games.

programme.title: Cywion Bach
programme.desc: Heddiw, mae ffrindiau'r Cywion Bach yn dangos gair arbennig - haul! Today, the friends of Cywion Bach are showing a special word - haul. Bîp Bîp goes to the beach to play in the sun.

programme.title: Og y Draenog Hapus
programme.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd ym myd Og a'i ffrindiau heddiw? What's happening in the world of Og and friends today?

programme.title: Deian a Loli
programme.desc: Mae Loli'n joio chwarae gyda'r ffiltyrs ar ffôn newydd ei mam ond mae pethau'n mynd rhy bell wrth iddi fynd i fewn i'r ffôn. Loli steps into the phone while playing with Mum's new filters!

programme.title: Octonots
programme.desc: Mae'r Octonots yn dilyn mamau pengwin ymerodrol sydd ar eu ffordd adref at eu teuluoedd. The Octonauts follow emperor penguin mums returning to their families.

programme.title: Fferm Fach
programme.desc: Mae Megan yn cael hwyl yn gwisgo fel archarwr ac yn mynd gyda Hywel y ffermwr hud i ddarganfod mwy am frocoli a sut mae'n cael ei dyfu. Megan finds out more about the superfood broccoli.

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach...
programme.desc: Heddiw, byddwn yn dysgu am sut mae'r byd yn troi, beth yw rhewlif a sut mae'n symud, a llawer mwy. Today we discover how different plants grow at different rates, and learn about wind!

programme.title: Sali Mali
programme.desc: Mae Jac Do'n ffotograffydd gwael ac mae ei ffrindiau'n gwneud hwyl am ben ei luniau! 'Dyw e ddim yn hapus am hyn, ond mae Sali Mali yn achub y dydd! Jac Do is upset but SM saves the day!

programme.desc: Cyfres gomedi i blant meithrin sy'n cynnwys sgetsys, eitemau doniol, jôcs a chymeriadau dwl newydd sbon. A comedy show for pre-school children, full of sketches, jokes and fun!

programme.desc: Mae'r Whws yn ffeindio be' ma nhw'n feddwl yw seren goll ar y traeth ac yn ceisio'i dychwelyd i'r awyr. The Woohoos find what they think is a fallen star on the beach and try to return it.

programme.title: Caru Canu a Stori
programme.desc: Er bod ei chwiorydd yn gwneud hwyl am ei ben, mae Deio'r hwyaden wrth ei fodd yn darllen llyfrau. Hurrah! Deio the duck finds a new friend who loves books as much as he does.

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: Pam bod pethau'n arnofio?'. Dyna mae Ela am wybod heddiw. Mae gan Tad-cu stori sili arall i'w rannu am bysgod anweledig. Today, Tadcu is on hand to tell a silly story about invisible fish.

programme.title: Sam Tan
programme.desc: Mae Siarlys a Sam wedi mynd i ffwrdd am benwythnos dawel i Ynys Pontypandy, ond dyw'r profiad ddim mor "dawel" a hynny. Sam and Siarlys go away for a quiet weekend to Pontypandy Island.

programme.title: Help Llaw
programme.desc: Mae'r gadwyn wedi torri ar feic Harri - lwcus mai i weithdy trwsio beics mae o'n mynd heddiw. The chain on Harri's bike has broken - lucky that he is going to a bike repair workshop today.

programme.title: Bwystfil
programme.desc: Mae dannedd miniog a genau cryf o fantais mawr yn y gwyllt! Wythnos yma, rydyn ni'n cael cip olwg ar ddeg anifail snaplyd. This week, we're taking a look at 10 of the snappiest beasts.

programme.title: New: Mwy o Stwnsh Sadwrn
programme.desc: Cipolwg yn ôl dros rai o uchafbwyntiau rhaglen dydd Sadwrn. Tune in to relive some of the highlights of Saturday's programme.

programme.title: LEGO ® Ffrindiau: Amdani Ferched!
programme.desc: Mae pump merch yn eu harddegau yn penderfynu ymuno da'i gilydd er mwyn achub eu hannwyl Ddinas Calon Lan. The girls form a super-doer group to protect and serve their beloved Heartlake.

programme.title: New: Y Smyrffs
programme.desc: Mae Llipryn yn herio Horwth i brawf cryfder ac yn ennill ar ddamwain! Wimpy challenges Hefty to a test of strength and wins by accident!

programme.title: Cefn Gwlad: Kiwis Cymreig
programme.desc: Cwrddwn a Mark 'yr Hewl', a Josie Gritten - ill dau wedi gadael Cymru a chodi pac am Seland Newydd gan drawsnewid eu ffordd o fyw. We meet two Welsh migrants who've settled in New Zealand.

programme.title: New: Heno
programme.desc: Rhaglen gylchgrawn nosweithiol gyda straeon o bob cwr o Gymru. Nightly magazine with stories from all over Wales and special guests.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Pobol y Cwm
programme.desc: Mae'n rhaid i Rhys gadw cyfrinach rhag o pwyllgor y carnival, ond a fydd yn llwyddo i gadw ei geg ar gau? Mathew gives an unwelcome visitor the cold shoulder.

programme.title: Rownd a Rownd
programme.desc: Yn dilyn sioc mawr, mae Anna'n diodde'n arw ac yn ceisio penderfynu sut i ymdopi efo sefyllfa Miles. Lowri receives more bad news at the hospital, with the possibility of further surgery.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: New: Gronyn Gobaith: Cymry CERN
programme.desc: Stori ryfeddol arbrawf mwya'r byd yn CERN, lle mae ffisegwyr o Gymru yn allweddol. The remarkable story of the biggest physics experiment in the world, where Welsh scientists are key.

programme.title: Y Byd ar Bedwar
programme.desc: Teithiwn i Belfast ac Ynys Môn i ddeall yr ystadegau am yr ieithoedd Celtaidd: A yw'r Gymraeg yn llithro o afael ei chadarnleoedd? A look at the statistics for the Irish and Welsh languages.

programme.title: Hewlfa Drysor
programme.desc: Lisa Angharad a'r Welsh Whisperer sy'n mynd â'u Hewlfa Drysor i Langrannog, i gynnal cystadleuaeth sy'n codi'r cythraul yn eu cynefin. This time, the "Hewlfa Drysor" heads to Llangrannog.

programme.title: Blociau Rhif
programme.desc: Hwyl a sbri i blant ifanc gyda'r blociau rhif. Fun and games for young children with the number blocks.

programme.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindau
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Tomos a'i ffrindiau. The adventures of Tomos and friends.

programme.title: Twt
programme.desc: Mae Cen Twyn wrthi'n trwsio corn Twt ac yn addo y bydd yn swnllyd iawn. Cen Twyn is repairing Twt's funnel and has promised Twt that once repaired it will be louder than ever.

programme.title: Blero yn Mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Mae cysylltydd Sïan ar goll ac mae Blero'n helpu'i ffrindiau i ddod o hyd iddo, yn y ganolfan ailgylchu! The monster helps his friends find Sïan's lost connector in the recycling centre.

programme.title: Sbarc
programme.desc: Cyfres wyddoniaeth gyda Tudur Phillips a'i ddau ffrind, Sbarc y gwyddonydd a Nef y Ditectif Natur. Science series with Tudur Phillips and friends. Today's theme is 'the night'.

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Helpa Odo Pen Bandit i glirio ac ail agor y llwybrau Natur sy wedi cau o gwmpas Maes y Mes. Odo helps Camp Leader to clear and open up some Nature trails.

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae Huwcyn a Cain yn gwneud teisen jeli anhygoel! Sut olwg fydd ar y deisen? On today's poptastic adventure, Huwcyn and Fly are making a spectacular jelly cake!

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach Ni
programme.desc: Heddiw, teithiwn i benrhyn Corea i weld gwlad De Corea. Dyma wlad sy'n siarad yr iaith Corëeg ac yn enwog am fwyd fel Kimchi a chrefft ymladd o'r enw Taekwondo. Today we go to South Korea.

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Mae Joni a Jini yn cyfnewid cyrff ar ddamwain! Gyda drwgweithredwyr angen eu dal, maen nhw'n dysgu meistroli eu sgiliau ei gilydd! Joni and Jini accidentally switch bodies!

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: 'Pam bod gyda ni goed?' yw cwestiwn Meg heddiw. Mae gan Tad-cu ateb doniol am y Brenin Boliog oedd ar dân eisiau mynd i barti pen-blwydd Tywysoges. Today Meg asks 'What are trees for?.

programme.title: Timpo
programme.desc: Adref Heb Fod Adref. Bydd cysgu dros nos yn Nhy Ffin yn hwyl ond mae gan Berwyn hiraeth. Home Away From Home: A sleepover at Ffin's would be great fun if Berwyn wasn't feeling homesick.

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Dewch ar antur gyda ni i gwrdd ag anifeiliaid bach y byd. Yn y rhaglen hon y teigr a'r lynx sy'n cael y sylw. Today we get to know the tiger and the lynx.

programme.title: Abadas
programme.desc: Mae delwedd heddiw'n un arbennig iawn, gan fod angen tri gair i ddisgrifio 'crwban y mor'. One of the Abadas goes to search for a creature that lives underwater - a sea turtle.

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Pan mae Pablo'n sylweddoli fod y siwgwr yn y caffi yn debyg iawn i'r tywod ar y traeth, mae'n cymysgu rhwng y ddau leoliad. Pablo confuses the sugar in the cafe with sand on the beach!

programme.title: Help Llaw
programme.desc: 'Sdim stêm yn codi o drên stem Porthmadog - felly ffwrdd a Harri i helpu Owain a gyrrwr y trên. The Steam Train at Porthmadog isn't working. Harri goes to help Owain and the train driver.

programme.title: Cymylaubychain
programme.desc: Ydy Ffwffa am droi ei chefn ar ei ffrindiau a mynd i deithio'r byd fel y cymylau mawr? Will Ffwffa leave her friends and travel the world like the big clouds?

programme.title: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: Mae Miss Petalau yn trefnu sioe ffasiwn gyda help Lisa Lân. Miss Petalau is arranging a fashion show with Lisa Lân's help.

programme.title: Annibendod
programme.desc: Mae Gwyneth wedi gweu siwmper i Maldwyn ond ma'r plant yn credu ei fod yn siwtio bwgan brain yn well. Gwyneth has knitted a jumper for Maldwyn but the kids think it better suits scarecrow.

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Mae Gwich yn dyheu i fynd a'i gwch ar antur ar y môr mawr! When his friends encourage him to follow his dream of going out on the boat, Toad quite reluctantly leaves the riverbank!

programme.title: Kim a Cai a Cranc
programme.desc: Ymunwch â Kim a Cai ar antur hudolus a chwareus yn llawn dawns a cherddoriaeth wrth iddyn nhw chwilio am gragen newydd i Cranc! Join Kim and Cai as they search for a new shell for Cranc!

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Cartwn hyfryd am gwdihw bach o'r enw Odo a'i ffrindiau yn y goedwig. Lovely cartoon about a little owl called Odo and his woodland friends.

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae Pip a'i ffrindiau'n mynd ar helfa stori tylwyth teg! On today's poptastic adventure, Zip and the friends are going on a fairy tale scavenger hunt!

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach Ni
programme.desc: Tro ma: Lloegr. Awn i Lundain i weld y tirnodau enwog a bwyta bwyd traddodiadol fel sgod a sglod. We visit London and its landmarks and eat some traditional food like fish and chips.

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Mae Joni a Jini yn dysgu gwers am fod yn or-hyderus wrth geisio atal Lili Lafant rhag defnyddio pwer y ddinas gyfan. Today, Joni and Jini learn a lesson about being overconfident.

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: Heddiw, mae Owen yn gofyn 'Pam bod llysiau yn dda i ti?'. Wrth gwrs, mae gan Tad-cu ateb doniol am rhandir hudol! In today's programme, Owen asks 'Why are vegetables good for you?'.

programme.title: Blociau Rhif
programme.desc: Hwyl a sbri i blant ifanc gyda'r blociau rhif. Fun and games for young children with the number blocks.

programme.title: Twt
programme.desc: Mae Twt wedi cyffroi'n lân - mae'r Harbwr Feistr wedi cytuno i gynnal cystadleuaeth yn yr harbwr. Twt is very excited as the Harbour Master has agreed to hold a talent competition.

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Mae Cacamwnci nôl gyda mwy o sgetsys dwl a doniol, a chymeriadau newydd fel Clem Clocsio, Myrddin y Dewin a Vanessa drws nesa. Cacamwnci is back with more funny and silly sketches!

programme.title: Blero yn Mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Mae Blero yn dysgu pam bod Talfryn wedi dal annwyd, a pha mor bwysig ydy bod yn lân bob amser. Talfryn's giant sneezes go a long way so Blero and his friends must keep Ocido germ free!

programme.title: Amser Maith Maith yn ôl
programme.desc: Mae Tadcu yn darllen stori am Tomi a Gwen sy'n byw adeg y Rhyfel Byd Cyntaf. Mae pawb yn ymgynnull i drefnu parti Croeso Adref mawr! Today, a WWI 'Welcome Home' Party is organised!

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Ffasiwn Drefn
programme.desc: Y tro hwn, cwpwrdd dillad Dafydd Lennon o Gaerdydd sy'n cael ei drawsnewid. This week, the team will be decluttering and transforming Dafydd Lennon's wardrobe at his home in Cardiff. [SL]

programme.title: Heno
programme.desc: Rhaglen gylchgrawn nosweithiol gyda straeon o bob cwr o Gymru. Nightly magazine with stories from all over Wales and special guests.

programme.title: Darn Bach o Hanes
programme.desc: Dewi Prysor sy'n edrych ar sut mae pobl wedi manteisio ar ein hadnodd naturiol mwyaf toreithiog - dwr. Dewi Prysor looks at how we use one of our most abundant natural resources - water.

programme.title: Garddio a Mwy
programme.desc: Rhaglen arbennig o'r Ardd Fotaneg - cyfle i greu trefniant blodau a rhyfeddu â'r Ardd Ddeu-fur. Special from the National Botanical Garden - we arrange flowers and admire the Walled Garden.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: New: Prynhawn Da
programme.desc: Cyfres gylchgrawn gydag eitemau coginio a ffasiwn a chyngor am bopeth o addurno'ch cartref i ddewis llyfr da. Magazine series including features on fashion, style, antiques and cookery.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Stori'r Iaith: Alex Jones
programme.desc: Alex Jones sydd yn Rhydaman yn darganfod beth oedd effaith y Chwyldro Diwydiannol ar yr iaith. Presenter Alex Jones explores how the Industrial Revolution affected the Welsh language.

programme.title: Blociau Lliw
programme.desc: Mae'r Blociau Lliw yn darganfod cyfres o Olwynion Lliwiau. Ond ble maen nhw ar yr olwynion? The Colourblocks discover a series of Colour Wheels. But where do they sit on them?

programme.title: Bendibwmbwls
programme.desc: Heddiw mae Ben Dant yn ymuno á disgyblion Ysgol Y Graig, Merthyr Tudful i greu trysor penigamp. Ben Dant is on a new adventure to recycle and turn rubbish and waste into a masterpiece.

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Heddiw, mae gan Pablo ddau fochyn coed i daro yn erbyn pethau, i weld sut mae'r pethau yna'n swnio. Today, Pablo has two pinecones for tapping, which turn out to be explorers!

programme.title: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: Mae pethau wedi mynd o ddrwg i waeth a mae cwmwl trwchus dros Gwmtwrch wrth i Llyfryn greu mwy o swynion rhyfedd. Things have gone from bad to worse and a thick cloud covers Cwmtwrch!

programme.title: Deian a Loli
programme.desc: Ma'r efeillaid yn edrych ymlaen i fwyta crempog, ond ma 'na greadur bach arall sydd yn awyddus i fwyta eu brecwast, pry cop o'r enw Prys! A spider called Prys is after the twins' pancakes!

programme.title: Y Doniolis
programme.desc: Yn y rhaglen hon, mae'r Doniolis yn cael eu galw i glirio lotment yn Cwm Doniol, ond mae 'na ddirgelwch i'w ddatrys yno. The Doniolis are called to clear the allotment in Cwm Doniol.

programme.title: Dyffryn Mwmin
programme.desc: Mae Fi Fach yn mynd rhy bell wrth bryfoco Mwmintrol. Fi Fach goes too far in teasing Moomintrol. As a result he decides to write a letter which causes Mwmian to return and take Fi Fach away.

programme.title: Parti
programme.desc: Rhaglen olaf. Mae'r cyflwynwyr yn Aber i helpu criw o fechgyn i greu parti go wahanol! Last episode. The presenters are in Aberystwyth to help a crew of boys create a party with a twist!

programme.title: New: Newyddion Ni
programme.desc: Newyddion i bobl ifanc. News programmes for youngsters.

programme.title: Arfordir Cymru: Bae Ceredigion
programme.desc: Afon Dyfi - Aberystwyth: Fferm islaw lefel y môr, boddi teyrnas Cantre'r Gwaelod a hanes enwau strydoedd Aberystwyth. Bedwyr investigates street names in Aberystwyth when he visits the town.

programme.title: Rownd a Rownd
programme.desc: Yn dilyn sioc mawr, mae Anna'n diodde'n arw ac yn ceisio penderfynu sut i ymdopi efo sefyllfa Miles. Lowri receives more bad news at the hospital, with the possibility of further surgery.

programme.title: Pobol y Cwm
programme.desc: Mynna Mathew ei fod yn iawn, ond mae'n amlwg bod ymweliad diweddar ei fam wedi cael effaith arno. Siwsi has her first day at APD, but not everyone makes her feel welcome.

programme.title: New: Hafiach
programme.desc: Mae hi'n benblwydd ar Cara ac mae'r criw am ddathlu eto! Fydd Ela yn darganfod cyfrinach Lefi a Cara wrth eu gweld yn cofleidio? Noa gets angry when he receives more messages from Jamie.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: New: Busnes Bwyd
programme.desc: Y tro hwn, mae'r tri yn ymweld â Phorth Eirias i gwrdd â'r cogydd Bryn Williams, ac i gyflwyno eu cynnyrch ar ei orau. The three visit chef, Bryn Williams, to present their fine produce.

programme.title: Trysorau'r Teulu
programme.desc: Cleddyf ddirgel sydd wedi bod yn y teulu ers cenedlaethau, casgliad o fasgotiaid ceir, a chrochenwaith Lladro sy'n cael sylw y tro ma. A mysterious dagger, car mascots and Lladro pottery.

programme.title: Hansh: Mwy Na Daffs a Taffs
programme.desc: Y tro hwn mae'r gantores o'r Alban Tallia Storm yn cyrraedd fel corwynt i dreulio deuddydd yn y brifddinas. Scottish singer Tallia Storm is in Wales on the hunt for music & single hot men.

programme.title: The Magic Sword
programme.desc: 1962. Adventure. Directed by Bert I. Gordon. Stars Basil Rathbone, Estelle Winwood & Gary Lockwood. Sir George, a young knight, sets out to rescue the woman he loves from the evil wizard Lodac. [S]

programme.title: The Ebb Tide
programme.desc: 1997. Adventure. Director: Nicholas Renton. Stars Robbie Coltrane & Chris Barnes. Three hapless adventurers agree to sail a ship to Australia with a secret cargo, but soon enough disaster strikes. [S]

programme.title: Second Best Bed
programme.desc: 1938. Comedy. Directed by Tom Walls. Stars Jane Baxter, Tom Walls, Veronica Rose & Carl Jaffe. A newly married couple run into difficulty when the wife refuses to obey her husband. [S]

programme.title: Prisoners of the Tower
programme.desc: 1946. Documentary. Directed by Cecil H. Williamson. Narrated by Valentine Dyall. A newly discovered film covering the fascinating story of The Tower of London. [S]

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: The Man Who Lied. 1955. Stars Hugh O'Brian, Rick Vallin & House Peters Jr. A man bent on revenge pays a gunman $1,000 to kill Wyatt Earp, with the gunman claiming that he has faced Earp before. [S]

programme.title: Undercover Agent
programme.desc: 1953. Crime Drama. An auditor (Dermot Walsh) is caught up in a murder and espionage whilst visiting a company. Starring Hazel Court. [S]

programme.title: Meet Mr Callaghan
programme.desc: 1954. Crime drama directed by Charles Saunders. Private detective Slim Callaghan (Derrick De Marney) is hired to find out why a rich uncle changed his will. [S]

programme.title: What's On TPTV With Noel
programme.desc: Founder of Talking Pictures TV and one half of the Footage Detectives, Noel Cronin, shares shows and films not to be missed at the end of June and beginning of July. [S]

programme.title: The Way Out
programme.desc: 1955. Crime. Director Montgomery Tully. Stars Gene Nelson, Mona Freeman & John Bentley. A man tells his wife he is being framed for murder, but the more she helps the more holes she finds. [S]

programme.title: The Battleaxe
programme.desc: 1962. Comedy. Directed by Godfrey Grayson. Stars Jill Ireland & Francis Matthews. A couple's pre-marital bliss is ruined by the bride's mother, leading the husband to be to make a bold decision. [S]

programme.title: Love is a Ball
programme.desc: 1963. Comedy. Director: David Swift. Stars Glenn Ford, Hope Lange & Charles Boyer. On the French Riviera, a matchmaker attempts to pair a poor duke and a wealthy heiress, but will all go to plan? [S]

programme.title: Devil's Bait
programme.desc: 1959. Drama. Director: Peter Graham Scott. Stars Geoffey Keen, Jane Hylton & Gordon Jackson. An incompetent rat-catcher leaves behind the poison he has used to eradicate rats from a small bakery. [S]

programme.title: Broken Journey
programme.desc: 1948. Drama. Directors: Ken Annakin & Michael C Chorlton. Stars Phyllis Calvert, James Donald & David Tomlinson. A plane crash lands miles from civilisation. The passengers must prevail. [S]

programme.title: The Edgar Wallace Mystery Theatre
programme.desc: On The Run. 1963. Directed by Robert Tronson. Stars Emrys Jones, Sarah Lawson, Patrick Barr, Delphi Lawrence & Kevin Stoney. The Governor is puzzled after Stewart makes a break from Prison. [S]

programme.title: Man from Interpol
programme.desc: A Man Alone. 1960. Stars Richard Stapley, Robert Rietty, Michael Balfour. Paul Lloyd is wanted for killing a guard at a bank and leaves for Italy. Agent Smith is sent to bring him back. [S]

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: The Yegg Foes in Gotham. 1966. Stars Adam West, Vincent Price & Gail Hire. The city's ownership has reverted to Egghead, who fires all city officials and opens the metropolis to the underworld. [S]

programme.title: Dial 999
programme.desc: Gun Rule. 1958. Stars Robert Beatty, John Witty & Peter Illing. Maguire asks for his men to be armed whilst investigating an attempted murder, but his request is denied. [S]

programme.title: Train of Events
programme.desc: 1949. Drama. Directed by Sidney Cole, Charles Crichton and Basil Dearden. Starring Jack Warner, Susan Shaw and Gladys Henson. A train disaster is told as four short stories. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: Caroline Munro is back to introduce two fascinating and frightening films this evening. We return to the Amityville franchise with the 1992 horror Amityville: It's About Time. [S]

programme.title: Amityville: It's About Time
programme.desc: 1992. Horror. Directed by Tony Randel. Stars Stephen Macht, Shawn Weatherly & Megan Ward. An architect brings home a mysterious antique clock, unaware of the demonic presence that haunts it. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: Join Caroline Munro as she presents the next chilling offering, the 1999 horror Presence of Mind, with an A-list cast including Sadie Frost, Lauren Bacall, Ella Jones, Harvey Keitel and Jude Law. [S]

programme.title: Presence of Mind
programme.desc: 1999. Horror. Director: Antoni Aloy. Stars Sadie Frost, Lauren Bacall & Harvey Keitel. A young governess is hired to take care of two children but soon discovers their house bears a dark secret. [S]

programme.title: Presence of Mind
programme.desc: 1999. Horror. Director: Antoni Aloy. Stars Sadie Frost, Lauren Bacall & Harvey Keitel. A young governess is hired to take care of two children but soon discovers their house bears a dark secret. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: Caroline Munro lets us in on what's coming up next week before closing up for the night. [S]

programme.title: Hammer House of Mystery and Suspense
programme.desc: A Distant Scream. 1984. Stars David Carradine, Stephanie Beacham & Stephen Greif. An old man, who has spent 20 years in prison for murder, gets a chance to go back to the past. [S]

programme.title: Games That Lovers Play
programme.desc: 1971. Directed by Malcolm Leigh. Two 'Madams' Joanna Lumley as 'Fanny Hill' and Penny Brahms as 'Lady Chatterley' have a wager as to who has the best brothel. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life Tails of the Law
programme.desc: 1965. An insight into the interesting jobs police dogs do and how they are trained.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jed Buys the Freeway. 1963. Stars Buddy Ebsen, Jesse White & Max Baer Jr. The Clampetts are visited by a stranger looking to get rich by selling Jed different monuments in the Los Angeles area. [S]

programme.title: Stagecoach West
programme.desc: The Storm. Western starring Wayne Rogers, Beverly Garland & Tom Drake. A pretty but violent and ruthless woman holds Luke at gunpoint during a blizzard, demanding he help her wounded lover. [S]

programme.title: Ambush In Leopard Street
programme.desc: 1962. Crime Thriller. Stars James Kenney & Bruce Seton. A retired thief forms a gang for one last job, a diamond shipment. With good locations and a British cast it's an enjoyable British B film. [S]

programme.title: Dangerous Cargo
programme.desc: 1954. Drama directed by John Harlow. Tim (Jack Watling) is tricked by a wartime friend (Terence Alexander) into revealing details of a gold shipment. [S]

programme.title: The Ghost of Rashmon Hall
programme.desc: 1948. Horror. Directed by Denis Kavanagh. Stars Valentine Dyall, Anne Howard, Alec Faversham & Howard Douglas. A doctor is summoned to an old, dark manor to clear the house of evil spirits. [S]

programme.title: The Cariboo Trail
programme.desc: 1950. Western. Director: Edwin L. Marin. Stars Randolph Scott, George Hayes & Bill Williams. Jim & Mike head to Canada via the Cariboo Trail to raise cattle and dig for gold but find trouble. [S]

programme.title: The Dark Eyes of London
programme.desc: 1939. Horror. Directed by Walter Summers. Stars Bela Lugosi & Hugh Williams. A series of drownings in the Thames starts Inspector Holt on the trail of one of London's most sinister murderers. [S]

programme.title: The Brothers
programme.desc: The Self Made Cross. 1975. Stars Robin Chadwick, Richard Easton & Stanley Meadows. David finally comes to terms with Jill's death. Meanwhile, Brian's recent divorce is taking a toll on him. [S]

programme.title: East of Sudan
programme.desc: 1964. Adventure. Directed by Nathan Juran. Stars Anthony Quayle, Sylvia Sims & Derek Fowlds. Two colonial soldiers in 19th-century Africa risk their lives to save a governess and her charge. [S]

programme.title: The Small Voice
programme.desc: 1948. Drama. Director: Fergus McDonell. Stars. James Donald, Valerie Hobson, David Greene, Howard Keel. A couple come across a car crash, where they discover that the occupants are armed. [S]

programme.title: Strange But True
programme.desc: The Rendlesham Incident. 1994. Michael Aspel delves into the story of a UFO sighting at a US airbase in Suffolk, which is claimed to have been covered up by the Ministry of Defence. [S]

programme.title: Z-Cars
programme.desc: Prey. 1978. Stars Tommy Boyle & Deidre Costello. Maureen always complained to the police - so much that they stopped listening. The pity is, if they hadn't, she might still be alive today. [S]

programme.title: Danger UXB
programme.desc: Dead Man's Shoes. 1979. Stars Anthony Andrews, Marjie Lawrence & Deborah Watling. Second Lieutenant Brian Ash joins his new regiment only to find that they are assigned to bomb disposal.

programme.title: Maigret

programme.desc: Fast Food and Healthy Food / Dairy Shop / Behind the Glass / The Taming of The Shrew: Rose and the wolves are racing. In the dairy isle of the grocery store. (S1 Ep3)

programme.title: Go! Go! Cory Carson
programme.desc: Grandpa's Treasure: It's the annual treasure hunt on Grandpa's birthday, and the Carsons follow clues to discover this year's hidden treasure! (S1 Ep13)

programme.title: Go! Go! Cory Carson
programme.desc: Ice Cream Truck: It's the hottest day of the year in Bumperton Hills, and Cory leads the town on a rollicking quest to find ice cream! (S1 Ep14)

programme.title: Go! Go! Cory Carson
programme.desc: Cops and Robbers: When Chrissy takes a game of cops and robbers a bit too seriously, Cory resolves to save his sister from a life of crime! (S1 Ep15)

programme.title: Go! Go! Cory Carson
programme.desc: Superhero School: Only a true hero can pass all the challenges that Cory and Freddie invent to test Chrissy's superhero abilities. (S1 Ep16)

programme.title: Go! Go! Cory Carson
programme.desc: Bored Games: When the TV suddenly stops working, the Carsons discover an even better way to entertain themselves. (S1 Ep17)

programme.title: Go! Go! Cory Carson

programme.title: Super Wings
programme.desc: World Robot vs Golden Robot Part 2: Jett finds himself stuck in ice in Antarctica courtesy of Golden Boy, Golden Wheels and a giant Golden Robot. (S6 Ep32)

programme.title: Super Wings

programme.title: Go! Go! Cory Carson
programme.desc: Mike's Carcade: Cory and Freddie compete against the Clutch Brothers in an epic video game battle of Go! Go! Dance Party. (S1 Ep10)

programme.title: Go! Go! Cory Carson
programme.desc: Flat Tire: Cory gets hurt during Bumperball practice, but doesn't want his injury to prevent him from playing in today's big game. (S1 Ep11)

programme.title: Go! Go! Cory Carson
programme.desc: Cory's New Bedroom: When Cory gets fed up sharing a bedroom with Chrissy, he packs up and moves into a new room all to himself. (S1 Ep12)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Scents: Grizzy decides to give she-bear the flowers that decorate the window ledges of the ranger's cabin. Can he bring them to her without the lemmings ruining them? (S1 Ep19)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Luck: After making a fool of himself in front of she-bear, Grizzy finds a four-leaf clover which seems to bring him good luck. Could his chance be changing? (S1 Ep20)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Magnetic Bear: Grizzy can't believe his eyes when he sees objects moving all by themselves, but it's the lemmings who are playing around. (S1 Ep21)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Charm: Grizzy believes that the she-bear he's in love with has been turned into a frog. He looks through the ranger's book of fairytales, searching for a way to turn her back. (S1 Ep22)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear's Best Friend: Grizzy discovers a baby raccoon near the log cabin. When the lemmings drag the baby into their dangerous games, the overprotective Grizzy steps in. (S1 Ep23)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Super Grizzy Bros: Grizzy discovers the joy of video games on the ranger's console. The lemmings want to try their hand at the joystick but Grizzy refuses to interrupt his racing game. (S1 Ep24)

programme.title: Bubble's Hotel
programme.desc: Carried Away: Bubble and Nabi must help their kite-loving guest land safely before the Island winds sweep him out to sea. (S1 Ep25)

programme.title: Bubble's Hotel
programme.desc: Groom-O-Matic: When a guest-built robot goes on the fritz, Bubble must find a way to stop it before it destroys the hotel. (S1 Ep26)

programme.title: True And The Rainbow Kingdom

programme.title: Esme and Roy

programme.title: Jeremy and Jazzy Compilations

programme.title: PJ Masks

programme.desc: Orticia Blooms: When an experiment goes wrong, Romeo tries to turn it to his advantage. (S5 Ep13)

programme.title: DinoCity

programme.title: DinoCity
programme.desc: Good-Luck Maker: Some days, things just don't go right. The kind of day that gets off on the wrong foot! Before, every fifth day was like this for Ricky. But everything is about to change! (S2 Ep19)

programme.title: DinoCity
programme.desc: News of the Day: A journalist has announced that the person who makes the most interesting report about the life of the city will appear on TV. Ricky goes searching for local news. (S2 Ep20)

programme.title: Molang

programme.title: Molang
programme.desc: The Monster Behind The Trees: Molang and Piu Piu think they saw a monster in the forest! Frightened at first, then intrigued, they try to find out more about this creature. (S5 Ep13)

programme.title: Molang
programme.desc: My First Christmas Tree: In Prehistory, after a terrible storm destroyed all their provisions, Molang and Piu Piu invent the first Christmas tree. (S5 Ep14)

programme.title: Molang

programme.title: Molang
